messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
What's the temperature in Grand Canyon in Fahrenheit

I’m afraid I don’t have direct access to real-time weather data (no built-in weather API). Are you looking for:

1. The current temperature at a specific point in the Grand Canyon (e.g. South Rim, North Rim, Phantom Ranch), in which case you might check a weather service such as NOAA or Weather.com?  
2. Typical average temperatures (e.g. monthly highs and lows) for the Grand Canyon area?  

Let me know which you need—or if there’s another way I can help!
I'm not sure. Could you check on a weather service?

I’m sorry, but I don’t have direct access to live weather feeds. For up-to-the-minute temperatures at the Grand Canyon I recommend checking a dedicated weather service such as:

• The National Weather Service (https://forecast.weather.gov) – search for “Grand Canyon South Rim” or “North Rim”  
• Weather.com or AccuWeather – just enter “Grand Canyon, AZ” in their search box  
• A smartphone weather app (e.g. Apple Weather, Google Weather)

If instead you’d like climatological (average) temperatures for a particular month or rim (South Rim, North Rim, Phantom Ranch, etc.), let me know which location and time of year and I can share those figures.
Okay, thanks. I'll check one of those sites myself.
You’re welcome! If you have any other questions—about the Grand Canyon or anything else—feel free to ask. Enjoy your day!
